statements: SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id > 3;
SELECT before_data FROM policy_data WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE after_data < 100.0;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policy_data ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, before_data, after_data FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_name FROM policy_data WHERE before_data < after_data;
SELECT * FROM policy_data ORDER BY implementation_date DESC, policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyBefore;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM PolicyBefore WHERE implementation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_id, implementation_date FROM PolicyBefore ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM PolicyBefore WHERE policy_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM PolicyBefore;
SELECT * FROM PolicyBefore WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM PolicyBefore WHERE policy_name LIKE 'abc%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, implementation_date FROM PolicyBefore ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM PolicyBefore GROUP BY policy_id, policy_name;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM PolicyAfter WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_data;
SELECT id, policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_data ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, assessment_date FROM policy_data WHERE assessment_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_impact WHERE impact_metric = 'customer_satisfaction';
SELECT policy_name, comparison_metric, before_value, after_value FROM policy_data JOIN policy_comparison ON policy_data.id = policy_comparison.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_data ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policy_data WHERE implementation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, impact_metric, impact_value FROM policy_data JOIN policy_impact ON policy_data.id = policy_impact.policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, comparison_metric, before_value, after_value FROM policy_data JOIN policy_comparison ON policy_data.id = policy_comparison.policy_id WHERE before_value > 100 AND after_value < 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies, AVG(impact_value) AS avg_impact_value FROM policy_impact GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY avg_impact_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies_before;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM policies_before WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policymaker_name, policymaker_role FROM policy_makers ORDER BY policymaker_name ASC;
SELECT policy_effectiveness, policy_impact FROM policies_after WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_comparison WHERE before_policy_effectiveness = 'High' AND after_policy_effectiveness = 'Medium';
SELECT * FROM policies_before WHERE policy_type = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date FROM policies_after WHERE policy_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policymaker_name, policymaker_role FROM policy_makers WHERE policymaker_role LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY policymaker_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_comparison ORDER BY comparison_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT policies_before.policy_name, policies_after.policy_effectiveness, policy_comparison.before_policy_effectiveness FROM policies_before INNER JOIN policies_after ON policies_before.policy_id = policies_after.policy_id INNER JOIN policy_comparison ON policies_before.policy_id = policy_comparison.policy_id WHERE policy_comparison.after_policy_effectiveness = 'Effective';
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_data_before WHERE policy_id = 2 AND data_value > 100;
SELECT policy_id, change_date, change_description FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_data_before pb JOIN policy_data_after pa ON pb.policy_id = pa.policy_id WHERE pb.data_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT pc.comparison_date, pc.comparison_result, p.policy_name FROM policy_comparison_result pc JOIN policies p ON pc.policy_id = p.policy_id ORDER BY pc.comparison_date DESC;
